date: Mon Mar 21 2022 01:41:08 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has told the club's official website that Bernd Leno has been having a tough time at the club. Leno started for Arsenal in their Premier League game against Aston Villa away from home at Villa Park in the Premier League on Saturday.  Aaron Ramsdale has established himself as the first-choice goalkeeper at Arsenal, but the Englishman was injured for the match.
metaDescription: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta told the club's official website that Bernd Leno has been having a tough time at the club.
topicText:
Arsenal beat Villa to cement fourth place
Arsenal have strengthened their hold on the fourth and final Champions League spot in the Premier League with a 1-0 win over Aston Villa, ...
Arsenal: 3 standout players from Aston Villa victory
Arsenal bounced back to winning ways against Villa. Standout players have boosted Arsenal's chances of the Champions League coming to the Emirates.
Positive Team Spirit At Arsenal Highlighted In One Photo After Win ...
A photo featuring Aaron Ramsdale and Bernd Leno has highlighted the positive team spirit in the Arsenal squad under Mikel Arteta.
Arsenal news and transfers live: Bukayo Saka injury update, Ashley ...

'Tough': Mikel Arteta admits £19m Arsenal player has struggled
Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has told the club's official website after the match against Aston Villa that Bernd Leno has been having a tough time.
'I'm really happy with the resilience we showed' | Quotes | News
Bukayo Saka reveals what's different about our mentality this season after our win against Aston Villa.
